link.title: 'Landlords Are a Scum Class': Everything I've Learnt About London Renting
link.desc: London is a hellscape for renters and it's not going to get better any time soon.

link.title: The Hollywood crisis #MeToo missed: 'Every female composer has been through it'
link.desc: My girlfriend is a composer and she absolutely has her own similar stories. Horrendous to read. Chipped in a few dollars to the Female Composer Safety League.
